statements: UPDATE choreography_details SET dance_routine = 'Hip Hop', counts = 32, formation = 'Circle' WHERE routine_id = 1;
UPDATE choreography_details SET music_cue = 'Start of Song', counts = 48, dance_routine = 'Contemporary', formation = 'Line' WHERE routine_id = 2;
UPDATE choreography_details SET counts = 32, formation = 'Circle' WHERE routine_id = 1;
UPDATE choreography_details SET dance_routine = 'Salsa', counts = 64, formation = 'Line', music_cue = 'Intro' WHERE routine_id = 3;
UPDATE choreography_details SET dance_routine = 'Contemporary', counts = 32 WHERE choreography_id = 1;
UPDATE dancers SET age = 28, name = 'Alice' WHERE dancer_id = 3;
UPDATE choreography_details SET counts = 10, formations = 'circle' WHERE choreography_id = 1;
UPDATE dancers SET age = 25, choreography_id = 2 WHERE dancer_id = 3;
UPDATE dance_routines SET choreographer = 'Alice', duration_minutes = 30 WHERE routine_id = 1;
UPDATE music_cues SET cue_description = 'End of routine' WHERE routine_id = 2;
UPDATE dance_routines SET choreographer='John Doe', duration_minutes=90 WHERE routine_id=101;
UPDATE counts SET beat_count=32, formation='Circle' WHERE routine_id=201;
UPDATE dance_routines SET choreographer='John Doe' WHERE routine_id=1;
UPDATE formations SET number_of_dancers=10, formation_description='Circular formation with 10 dancers' WHERE formation_id=3;
UPDATE dance_routines SET choreographer='Alice Smith', music_cues='Intro, Verse, Chorus' WHERE routine_id=1;
UPDATE counts SET tempo=120, beat_count=4 WHERE count_name='Start';
UPDATE DanceRoutines SET counts = 10 WHERE dance_id = 1;
UPDATE Choreographers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE choreographer_id = 2;
UPDATE DanceRoutines SET counts = 10, formation = 'Circle' WHERE dance_id = 1;
UPDATE Choreographers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE choreographer_id = 3;
